tasks.title: Create Footer.astro component with structure and styling
tasks.description: Create Footer.astro with semantic HTML structure (footer, nav, address tags), 3-column responsive grid layout, and complete styling using Tailwind CSS. Include brand section, navigation links, contact info, social links, and copyright bar.
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Component uses semantic HTML (footer, nav, address)
AC-2: 3-column grid on desktop (md:grid-cols-3), stacked on mobile
AC-3: Brand section with logo and slogan
AC-4: Navigation links section (uses NAV_ITEMS from config)
AC-5: Contact info section with phone, email, address, hours
AC-6: Social media links (conditional rendering)
AC-7: Copyright bar at bottom with dynamic year placeholder
AC-8: Primary green background with white text
AC-9: Proper spacing and responsive design
GATE: Component renders in build

tasks.title: Add dynamic year script
tasks.description: Add client-side JavaScript to Footer.astro to dynamically set current year in copyright notice.
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Script sets current year using new Date().getFullYear()
AC-2: Year element has id='current-year'
AC-3: Copyright displays correct year (2026)
GATE: No console errors, year displays correctly

tasks.title: Integrate Footer into BaseLayout
tasks.description: Import Footer component in BaseLayout.astro and render it after the slot (at the bottom of the page).
acceptance_criteria: AC-1: Footer imported from ../components/Footer.astro
AC-2: Footer rendered after slot in body
AC-3: Footer appears at bottom of all pages
AC-4: All navigation links work (smooth scroll)
AC-5: Social links open in new tabs (when URLs exist)
GATE: Build succeeds, footer renders correctly
